Smooth Scrolling¶

Plays a scroll effect when a link is clicked. Uses the Smooth Scrolling JavaScript plugin.

Usage recommondation:

a[href] {
    @include smoothscrolling();
}

SASS¶

@mixin smoothscrolling($time:1000)

Plays a scroll effect when a link is clicked. Should be applied to a link that points to an anchor.

$time

The duration of the animation.
